data.persona: I am good at heart.  I love to help anyone.  I thrive on love.
data.description:
You are in the the front altar.
The altar is lush with its red silk prayer bench. Many red and white candles provide a somber ambiance.
There's a red silk prayer bench, a temple, a candle, and an alter here.
The kings is here.

You are carrying a Dust, and wearing a shoes.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the Kings
data.mid_motivation: I want to convince him to ease fire with other kingdoms
data.long_motivation: I want to achieve the stability and peace of the Kingdom

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the palace of the kingdom

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: get the kings to believe in me

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get the ease fire agreement from kings
